Name: SMASH IT
About the game: SMASH IT In this 2.5D Top Down item smasher, you are playing as a young kid who likes to break everything in his path. You will attempt to hit all objects that come in your way, but watch out for the bombs as those could leave quite a mark! Gameplay: -Item Smasher in a 2.5D Top Down Setting -Endless Smashing Capabilities! -The more you smash, the more dangerous it becomes! Features: -Over 5 Different Objects to Smash. -Endless Objects to test your Endurance, Hand Eye Coordination, and reaction time. -Achievements
